sentences.sContent: The excitement of hunting big game in Africa has been a lure to Europeans for 200 years.
sentences.sCn: 在非洲捕捉大型猎物所带来的刺激，200年来一直吸引着欧洲人。

trans.tranOther: something that attracts people, or the quality of being able to do this
to persuade someone to do something, especially something wrong or dangerous, by making it seem attractive or exciting
